Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Blessing III</size></color>
Desc: Machiavelli will summon 2 <color=#34aff9>Iron Thorns</color> for every 25% HP lost. The Iron Thorns will destroy the platform in 35s.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Solo</size></color>
Desc: When the enemy has less then 3 allies nearby, gain 10% Extra DMG for each missing ally (max 30%)

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Command I</size></color>
Desc: For every ally the enemy has nearby, you gain 5% Extra DMG (max 3 stacks)

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Command II</size></color>
Desc: For every ally the enemy has nearby, you gain 10% Extra DMG (max 3 stacks)

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Command III</size></color>
Desc: For every ally the enemy has nearby, you gain 15% Extra DMG (max 3 stacks)

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Penetration</size></color>
Desc: Each time the enemy hits lose 3% DEF for 10s (max 10 stacks)

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Lightning Shield</size></color>
Desc: Whenever the enemy is attacked, there is a 10% chance to trigger a lightning bolt (CD: 5s).

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Wave II<</size></color>
Desc: A shockwave will be created when an enemy stands up, sending nearby enemies flying (CD:18s)

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Wave II</size></color>
Desc: A shockwave will be created when an enemy stands up, sending nearby enemies flying (CD:14s)

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Wave III</size></color>
Desc: A shockwave will be created when an enemy stands up, sending nearby enemies flying (CD:10s)

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Lightning Mine</size></color>
Desc: Enemy attacks plant a mine under their target that detonates after some time, dealing Physical DMG equal to 15% of their ATK.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Invisibility</size></color>
Desc: Attack invisible enemies to cause them to appear and be unable to go invisible again for 3s.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Mechanic Target</size></color>
Desc: <color=#CF0000>Dodge red orbs and destroy crystals</color>

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Red Crystal</size></color>
Desc: After defeating, all red orbs on the battlefield will convert to blue orbs.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Red Orb</size></color>
Desc: Dodge red orbs, or they will explode when they get too close.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Blue Orb</size></color>
Desc: When red orbs are converted into blue orbs, they will attack the nearest enemy.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Soundwave Fever Value</size></color>
Desc: After destroying all crystals or triggering all red orbs, Fever will be calculated by the number of converted blue orbs.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Mechanic Target</size></color>
Desc: <color=#CF0000>Lay red tiles and destroy crystals to convert them into blue tiles</color>

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Red Crystal</size></color>
Desc: After destroying a crystal, there is a chance for all red orbs on the battlefield to conver to blue orbs.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Spotlight</size></color>
Desc: After entering the mechanic, the area surrounding the player will flash white, green, yellow and red every second. Once the tile flashes red, it will stay red.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Red Tile</size></color>
Desc: Red tiles will explode if spotlights shine on them. Be careful!

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Blue Tile</size></color>
Desc: Converted from red tiles

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Spotlight Fever Value</size></color>
Desc: After destroy all of the crystals, Fever will be calculated based on the number of blue tiles converted.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Mechanic Target</size></color>
Desc: <color=#CF0000>Aim and attack crystals to defeat fairies in a straight line</color>

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Precision Crystal</size></color>
Desc: Direction signs will appear at close range. Destroying the crystal will send a wrecking ball that direction and destroy fairies in a straight line.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Fairy</size></color>
Desc: Can only by destroyed by wrecking ball

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Crash Fever Value</size></color>
Desc: After destroying a crystal or all fairies, Fever will be calculated based on the number of fairies defeated.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Mechanic Target</size></color>
Desc: <color=#CF0000>While avoiding red orbs, destroy crystals to convert red tiles and orbs.</color>

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Fever Value</size></color>
Desc: Fever will be calculated based on the number of blue orbs and tiles

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Mechanic Target</size></color>
Desc: While aiming attacks in a straight line to defeat fairies, convert as many red tiles on the ground as possible.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Fever Value</size></color>
Desc: Fever will be calculated based on the number of fairies defeated and blue tiles converted.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Mechanic Target</size></color>
Desc: <color=#CF0000>While avoiding red orbs, defeat as many fairies as possible</color>

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Fever Value</size></color>
Desc: Fever will be calculated based on the number of fairies and blue orbs destroyed.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Co-op Mechanic</size></color>
Desc: A boss will shuttle between team members every 30s. Members not facing the boss will have to deal with the mechanics. Maintain the Fever status to defeat the boss!
TeachingContents[1]: Text: Use talents and stage clearing mechanisms to support your teammates. Your Fever value will be calculated after clearing a mechanic. Once the entire team reaches 100 Fever, the team will enter a Fever state and gain a massive bonus!

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Soundwave Dodge III</size></color>
Desc: Dodge red orbs and destroy crystals.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Spotlight Battlefield</size></color>
Desc: Lay red tiles and destroy crystals to convert them to blue tiles.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Crystal Crash</size></color>
Desc: Aim and attack crystals to defeat fairies in a straight line.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Mechanic Target</size></color>
Desc: <color=#CF0000>Pick up all signal orbs as quickly as possible</color>

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Signal Orb</size></color>
Desc: After picking up, trigger talent 2 to buff you and your teammates.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Mechanic Target</size></color>
Desc: <color=#CF0000>Arrive at the endpoint, then learn how to raise and lower walls.</color>

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Blue Wall</size></color>
Desc: Walking over wall tiles will raise then. Once fully enclosed, the walls will turn yellow and begin to slowly lower.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Red Wall</size></color>
Desc: Can form an enclosed wall

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Mechanic Target</size></color>
Desc: <color=#CF0000>Pick up all signal orbs</color>

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Mechanic Target</size></color>
Desc: <color=#CF0000>Defeat enemies and pick up all the Orbs</color>

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Orb</size></color>
Desc: Defeat all the enemies on the battlefield. Pick up Orbs of the same color for 2 points. Pick up Orbs of a different color for 1 point.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Mechanic Target</size></color>
Desc: <color=#CF0000>Dodge red orbs and defeat enemies</color>

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Angry Players</size></color>
Desc: Red orbs will continuously spawn at the edge of the battlefield and rush to the player after a period of time. Destroy them to increase Fever.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Conscious Players</size></color>
Desc: Converts after defeating the Angry Players

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Mechanic Target</size></color>
Desc: <color=#CF0000>Defeat enemies and illuminate star lanterns</color>

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Star Lantern</size></color>
Desc: Players must stand under a star lantern for 5s to activate it, then it will disappear in 15s.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Star Lantern Illumination</size></color>
Desc: Fighting under spotlights will reward the corresponding buff.
TeachingContents[1]: text:Lanterns will turn either red, yellow, or green depending on the class that illuminates them.
TeachingContents[4]: text: [Green]：Recover 10% of Max HP every second
